text: Yadi timila'i ascarya lagcha bhane vastavama unako yo bhana'i ajiba cha ki jaba hami mato bha'ihalchaum taba ke hami nayam janmama hunechaum. Yiniharu nai hun jasale aphno palanaharamathi kuphra gareka chan, yahi nai huna jasaka ghamtiharuma papi patta hunechan ra yahi nai hun jo narka (jannahama) ma rahanevala hun, jo yasama sandhai sandhaika lagi rahanechan
